-- SQL Server Permission Revoke Script
-- Generated by Encina Module Isolation
-- Use this script to clean up permissions before reconfiguring
-- This script is idempotent and can be run multiple times safely

-- Revoke permissions for module: Orders

-- Revoke from module schema: orders
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON SCHEMA::[orders] FROM [orders_user];
REVOKE EXECUTE ON SCHEMA::[orders] FROM [orders_user];
PRINT 'Revoked permissions on schema orders from orders_user';

REVOKE SELECT ON SCHEMA::[lookup] FROM [orders_user];
PRINT 'Revoked SELECT on schema lookup from orders_user';
REVOKE SELECT ON SCHEMA::[shared] FROM [orders_user];
PRINT 'Revoked SELECT on schema shared from orders_user';
REVOKE SELECT ON SCHEMA::[audit] FROM [orders_user];
PRINT 'Revoked SELECT on schema audit from orders_user';
GO

PRINT 'Permission revokes completed successfully.';
